Enum TLx493D_PowerModeType_t¶

  • Defined in File tlx493d_types.h

Enum Documentation¶

enum TLx493D_PowerModeType_t¶

The enumeration TLx493D_PowerModeType_t defines the different power modes of the sensors. The available ones are depending on the sensor variant that you are using.

Values:

enumerator TLx493D_POWER_DOWN_MODE_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_FAST_MODE_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_LOW_POWER_MODE_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_ULTRA_LOW_POWER_MODE_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_MASTER_CONTROLLED_MODE_e¶
